Reviews.Title: Samsung B2100 is not Stupid Proof
Reviews.Author: Fred
Reviews.Content: Anyone that's had troubles with them not surviving water, must have broken them on purpose, so they could have a 'smart phone.' Mine has accumulated metal chips from working in a machine shop, and I think it's on it's last legs (after 4 years of dropping them in mud, on concrete and into water,) but if I took better care of it, it would last me a lot longer. The battery lasts 4-6 days on a full charge, and the recharge only takes 3 hours. It pairs with Motorola S305 wireless Bluetooth Stereo headphones too, so if like to talk hands-free, it works for me. They also play music from your phone - and the music shuts off when a call comes through, and returns to music after you press a button to hang up. I recently got an iPhone, just so that I can get online for college, but I've tried smart phones before, and I may be back to using this phone again in a month or so. It's really reliable in harsh environments! The flashlight comes in handy and I use it at least once or twice a day. It works on the AT&T; 3G or 4G sim card. It has so many features, I'm guessing you'll never use all of them (if you're a real man). I've dropped mine more than a few times - more than 10 feet, and other than a few scratches, it still works great. The rubber back peeled off in the first month, but that's because I took the back off so many times, trying to find a carrier, and using everyone's SIM cards. AT&T; finally won the battle.

Reviews.Title: Busy Homeowner in PA
Reviews.Author: Elwyn
Reviews.Content: It is a great phone.  the sound quality is excellent.  It is easy to use.  I only wanted a telephone, not a smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Waterproof as a paperback book
Reviews.Author: jsinac
Reviews.Content: I am a fishing guide and bought this phone because it was advertised as waterproof in up to 1 meter of water for up to 30 minutes.  I dropped it in less than a foot of water, it was submerged for less than a minute and the phone is now completely useless.  This phone is junk.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: gerald raab
Reviews.Content: This phone was as advertised. I just plugged my att simcard in and it is working fine. If you want a basic no frills phone this is a great choice

Reviews.Title: Tough
Reviews.Author: Felipe Amaral
Reviews.Content: I saw some videos about the mobile. The phone is amazing, the signal is very good and is really rugged. I put to a test almost every week. It got a little scratched but did not lose any functionality. I just changed cause I wanted an smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Great no frills phone
Reviews.Author: redcat
Reviews.Content: I got the phone a few years ago for its ruggedness.  In that regard it is stellar.  It has survived a trip through the washing machine (accidental), the occasion rinse under the faucet when it gets dusty, and I can answer the phone in shower (the manual does tell you not to submerge the phone, however).It has basic web browsing, a music player, and a sub-par camera.  I find the built-in LED flash light to be invaluable.  There is a newer version, GT-B2710, that  supports 3G data access but otherwise looks identical.
